alert.name: [TVM] Linux Capture Desktop using Import Tool-T1113
alert.description: This rule is managed by Omma, rule ID: AE6PwtIMNhZUOmR.
alert.search:
index=osquery_logs name=ais_process_events columns.cmdline IN ("* xwd *", "*import -window *") earliest=-15m@m
| rename columns.* as * 
| eval risk_id="d7819b08-0a40-420f-a22e-bc6e7a0edb64"
| lookup aipo_risk_table.csv risk_id as risk_id 
| eval risk_impact=spath(risk_meta_data, "risk_impact"), risk_confidence=spath(risk_meta_data, "risk_confidence"), risk_object_type=spath(risk_meta_data, "risk_object_type"), risk_ttp=spath(risk_meta_data, "mitre_attack_id")
| eval risk_score=risk_impact*(risk_confidence/100)
| eval risk_validity_period=2592000, risk_expired=0, risk_triggered=0, risk_object_importance=1.2, risk_vm_factor=1
| eval risk_object=json_object(
"dest",hostIdentifier,
"user",uname
)
| eval risk_context=json_object(
"dest",hostIdentifier,
"user_id",uid,
"user",uname,
"process_id",pid,
"process_name",name,
"process_ts",pid_ts,
"process_current_directory",cwd,
"process_exec",procexe,
"cmdline",cmdline,
"process_group_id",pgid,
"session_id",ses,
"process_path",path,
"parent_process_id",ppid,
"parent_process_ts",ppid_ts,
"parent_process_exec",pprocexe
)
| eval _key=md5(risk_context+risk_object+risk_object_type)
| table _key _time risk_name risk_id risk_ttp risk_impact risk_confidence risk_score risk_object risk_object_type risk_stage risk_context risk_expired risk_triggered risk_validity_period risk_object_importance risk_vm_factor
| collect index=aipo_phantom_summary source=AIPO_HIDS
